basics.name: Jinlei Hu
basics.label: Ph.D. Student
basics.summary: A Ph.D Student at Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST). My research is primarily focused on high-performance index structures for persistent memory and SSDs.

education.institution: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
Huazhong University of Science and Technology
University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

publications.name: RWORT: A Read and Write Optimized Radix Tree for Persistent Memory

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
